info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...DEVELOPING SHOWERS ACROSS THE SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS LIFTING NORTHEAST TOWARD BURLEY, MALTA, AND SWEETZER SUMMIT THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 435 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing line of showers extending from 8 miles south of Oakley Reservoir to 12 miles southwest of Juniper, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph and brief showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Malta, Oakley Reservoir, Oakley, Almo, Juniper, Elba, Mt Harrison, Stone, City Of Rocks, Sweetzer Summit and Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
